name: A rogueLike game with no name TwT
name_original: A rogueLike game with no name TwT
description:
This is only for  study purpose😇 

You can download it for free. When click on download button, if you don't want to donate, you can click on "No thanks take me to download instead". Donation are really really appreciated, eternal gratitude will be offered 👀👀

Make sure to comment 👍 let me know what you think! i know it's incomplete and  probably there won't be future updates.. maybe🦦

The main graphic assets aren’t mine, credits to 0x72, you can download them here: : https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii?download

note: you can use dash to pass through walls, sometimes rooms are blocked... am I lazy?🤔
